short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays recipe information in a clean overlay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Love recipe's and hate scrolling past the authors life story before you get to the reason why you're on the page. This extension is for you!

This plugin works automatically and will show an overlay on any pages that have a recipe*

When you load a page we'll extract the key recipe information and show that to you in a no-bloat way meaning you can get straight into the recipe you're trying to make


* Sites must be using recipe markup for this to work, generally of they're writing a whole life story to get their word count up for SEO. they'll be using this markup to tell search engines about their recipe.
